channel.title: How to make server check what wep you have on when you first log on?
channel.description: O.K. I managed to get iron hally the attacking emote that i want. but when you log on with the iron hally it dosent do attacking emote(you have to unequip it then equip it to see attacking emote). How can i fix this?
